summary: Replaces quivers for all arrows type with leather quiver. Updated version of Arrows and Quiver mod.
descriptionHtml:
THIS MOD IS NO LONGER SUPPORTED!

For those who don\'t know what I\'m talking about. This mod replaces quiver for all arrow types (except Nord and Falmer) on leather quiver like iron arrows use. Also color of the quiver was changed on black to better fit Nightingale and Guild Master armor.
This version got minor clipping bugs fixes and also quiver now mounted lower on your back so it looks better imho. For now no more changes done as I got no free time to finish this and make new hi-res arrows textures. No more words. Download and enjoy.

Installation: copy/paste.
updating: copy overwriting old files.
author: mluppov
